Hero.turbos_desc: Buy now and feel the difference! Industrial power guaranteed for heavy machinery.
Hero.excavators_desc: Critical components for high-performance excavators. We keep your site moving with premium parts.
Hero.motors_desc: Complete engines and internal parts. Extreme durability for the most demanding industrial conditions.

Categories.title: Featured Categories
Categories.desc: Find replacements for all types of heavy machinery. Quality and warranty in every piece.

CallToAction.title: Can't find the part you're looking for?
CallToAction.desc: Our team of experts helps you locate any part in minutes. We have a global network of suppliers.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
WhyChooseUs.desc: Quality, trust, and experience in each of our parts.
WhyChooseUs.inv_desc: More than 50,000 part numbers ready for immediate shipping. Everything you need in one place.
WhyChooseUs.shipping_desc: Optimized logistics to deliver your parts where you need them, in record time.
WhyChooseUs.quality_desc: We only work with leading brands and certified products to ensure the durability of your machinery.
WhyChooseUs.support_desc: Our team of experts advises you to find the exact part you need.

Nosotros.subtitle: We are a company dedicated to the import, distribution, and commercialization of vehicle and heavy machinery spare parts.
Nosotros.logistics_desc: We have rigorous internal administrative and commercial processes that allow us to provide prompt response to our customers' needs.
Nosotros.tech_desc: We provide service with the best technological tools and a wide database that allows us to be at the forefront of the market.
Nosotros.experts_desc: We have highly trained personnel and experts in the area who will provide you with the best attention, resolving your doubts and managing your products.
Nosotros.services_subtitle: Maintenance and repair with top-of-the-line technicians
Nosotros.hydraulics_desc: Specialized technicians with great experience in the maintenance and repair of hydraulic systems.
Nosotros.diesel_desc: Experts with over 30 years of experience ensuring the useful life of your engine.
Nosotros.swing_desc: Accurate diagnoses with state-of-the-art mobile equipment.
Nosotros.travel_desc: Comprehensive technical service with national coverage and cutting-edge equipment.
Nosotros.commitment_desc: At Gestor de Partes, our mission is to keep your machinery operating at peak performance with the best spare parts on the market.

Contacto.title: Contact Us
Contacto.desc: We are a company specialized in the import, distribution, and commercialization of spare parts for heavy machinery located in Medellín – Colombia.
Contacto.attention_desc: Contact us through our phone lines and request personalized attention:
Contacto.not_found_title: Can't find the part you're looking for?
Contacto.not_found_desc: If you don't find the part you're looking for, contact us and request attention within minutes at one of our physical branches.
Contacto.work_desc: Do you want to be part of our network of suppliers?

Legal.privacy_subtitle: At Gestor de Partes, we are committed to the security and protection of our users' data.
Legal.privacy_statement_desc: GESTOR DE PARTES establishes the terms in which it uses and protects the information provided by its users. We ensure it will only be used according to the terms of this document.
Legal.info_collected_desc: We may collect personal information such as: Name, email, and demographic information.
Legal.data_use_desc: We use the information to provide the best possible service, particularly to maintain a registry of users and orders.
Legal.cookies_desc: Cookies serve to identify visited pages and their frequency for statistical analysis.
Legal.external_links_desc: This website may contain links to other sites of interest. We are not responsible for the protection of your data on those third parties.
Legal.control_info_desc: You can restrict the collection or use of your personal information at any time.
Legal.transparency_desc: If you have any doubts about how we handle your data, you can contact our team directly.
Legal.terms_subtitle: This information may be subject to changes according to the processes and policies of Gestor de Partes.
Legal.returns_policy_important: Important: After 7 calendar days from the billing date, no returns are accepted.
returns_policy_rules: Spare parts marked as non-returnable (*) have no return.
It is imperative that the parts are in perfect condition and in their original packaging.
100% of the value will be credited for errors attributable to the company.
If the error is not the company's, 80% of the value will be credited.
Legal.warranty_validity: Validity: Starts from the delivery of the part.
Legal.warranty_coverage: Coverage: Damage caused by manufacturing or material defects.

NotFound.subtitle: Oops! You're lost in space...
NotFound.description: It looks like the page you're looking for doesn't exist or one of our developers fell asleep.

Footer.slogan: Your strategic ally in automotive spare parts and specialized equipment. Quality that moves the world.
